   contain the root `toctree` directive.

BioHeatmap
======================================
`BioHeatmap <https://github.com/DingWB/BioHeatmap>`_ is a python package to plot complex heatmap (clustermap) with biological data.

.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   installation
   quickstart_example
   documentation
   examples
   modules

Credits and Thanks
========================
The package was provided by Wubin Ding and Zhoulab.
